title: Schedule
text:
Here’s your roadmap for the semester! Each week, follow the general process outlined below:

Enjoy the notes / text 
Attend class, review the warm-up and solutions if you have any questions after completing it during class.
Complete the HW assignment ( pdf &  Rmd linked below),  submit the assignment via Gradescope accessed on the course Canvas site.
Discuss the reflection questions  and ethics considerations  (see the  class notes) with your classmates, mentor, and professor.
The textbook is Practicing Statistics, by Kuiper and Sklar.
